page.title: 10RAILWAYS IN CARLISLE
page.content: Carlisle is a 'railway city' that grew and expanded to serve the railway companies.The housing bordering our block in Denton Holme was built for the railway workers. My dad works on the railway, he is employed by {British Rail.}He has to go under the trains to maintain and repair them. He likes his job. The railways have got better over the years, although some people think it is still quite expensive to travel by train. One thing I hate is the price of food on the trains. The latest slogan for{British Rail}is {"We're getting there." A close look at a map of Carlisle shows our block to be crossed by four routes, the main London to Glasgow, Carlisle to Newcastle, Carlisle to West Cumbria and the Carlisle to Settle line.
